resources.string: Test your knowledge with a fun quiz!

Each game consists of 14 mathematical questions, covering 7 topics. Questions are presented in a multiple choice format, with only one correct answer. 

Each question has a time limit, so make sure to answer before time is up! Please complete all questions as progress is not saved. 

Have Fun!
\nView detailed information about your score below. \nInteract with the pie chart to view specific details about your quiz session.
